ABOUT ME

Stories

Pictures are all pre-pandemic or from take-out my dad picked up. We've been staying at home since March, with contact being limited to my dad picking up groceries or take-out. Please wear a mask and social distance if you choose to go out for leisure!

IRVINS x BOPOMOFO

Dec 9, 2020 — I’m honored and ecstatic to finally announce that I’m a partner for the exclusive launch of IRVINS Salted Egg Salmon Fish Skin chips! IRVINS Salted Egg chips turned a signature Salted Egg Crab dish, which became a local River Valley phenomenon, into some #DangerouslyAddictive snacks. Stories of My Favorite Foods

Nov 4, 2020 — Food represents celebration, warmth, and unity to me. At its core, food brings people together, whether it’s an excuse to catch up with old friends or just enjoying a meal with the people you love.
